name: cpf-cnpj-generator
title: CPF/CNPJ Generator
description: Generate CPF (Cadastro de Pessoa Físca) number or CNPJ (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoa Jurídica) number data for developers
author: gstvds

commands.name: cpf
commands.title: Generate CPF
commands.description: Generate CPF (Cadastro de Pessoa Física) data for developers

commands.name: cnpj
commands.title: Generate CNPJ
commands.description: Generate CNPJ (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoa Jurídica) data for developers

preferences.name: pasteToApplication
preferences.label: Paste to frontmost Application
preferences.description: Copy the content to the Clipboard and also paste to the frontmost application
